page.title: 10Leisure/Entertainment.
page.content: There are very few places where people can go for their entertainment in the area.There is only one cinema,the Monico,which is used by a great proportion of people young and old at some time of the year.It is not a large cinema but it does show some very modern films.Much of the people's home entertainment consists of watching television and video films. Children who were surveyed on leisure interests listed watching television as the fourth most popular for girls, behind swimming,Girl Guides and music. For boys it was third most popular behind swimming and Boy Scouts.The most popular types of television programme are cartoons,quizes,pop music shows and adventure films. Many of the families have video recorders.
